pyqt_gui module

PyQt5 GUI Module for School Management System

This module provides a comprehensive PyQt5-based graphical user interface for the school management system. It includes tabbed interfaces for managing students, instructors, courses, registrations, and provides search functionality with data persistence capabilities.

class pyqt_gui.SchoolManagementPyQt[source]

Bases: QMainWindow

Main PyQt5 application window for the school management system.

Provides a comprehensive GUI interface with tabbed navigation for managing students, instructors, courses, and their relationships. Features include data entry forms, search functionality, data export capabilities, and persistent storage using JSON files.

Variables:

  • system (SchoolManagementSystem) – The core school management system instance

  • tab_widget (QTabWidget) – Main tabbed interface container

init_ui()[source]

Initialize the user interface components.

Sets up the main window, creates the tabbed interface, and initializes all tab content including student management, instructor management, course management, registration, data display, and search functionality.
